Specification Table with Hours and Marks
Course Code MCA2002 Internet and Web Programming Course Type Credits LTP 4
Knowledge of Object Oriented Programming concepts and Basic JAVA concepts are preferred.

Objective:

 To understand the basic concepts of web programming and internet.
 To understand how the client-server model of Internet programming works.
 To develop interactive, client-side, executable web applications

Expected Outcomes:

Students who complete this course will be able to
 Understand, analyze and evaluate a system using Internet /web programming concepts.
 Identify and formulate and solve web related problems.
 Use techniques, skills and apply algorithmic principles to design web based applications.
Student Outcomes (SO): a, b, h, m
